name: Industrial Filament
content:
Industrial Filament

A network of industrial structures connected by glowing energy filaments. Primary Objectives are power junctions. Secondary markers are control nodes or maintenance stations. The air crackles with energy as the filaments pulse with power.


Terrain Features:

  • Power junctions
  • Control nodes
  • Maintenance stations
  • Energy filaments

Atmosphere:

The air is charged with energy, and the constant hum of power fills the battlefield. The ground is crisscrossed with glowing filaments that pulse with industrial might.
